data.title: Workshops for people who are serious about writing
data.meta_description: The Six-Week Workshop will be in Seattle from June 16 to July 27. Applications are now open through March 1, 2024.
data.text:
The 2024 Butler and Worldbuilder Scholars

Tanisha Tekriwal is this year’s Octavia E. Butler Memorial Scholarship recipient This scholarship has been donated annually since 2007 by the Carl Brandon Society to…

Silence Does Not Lend Itself To Change

News of the allegations against Neil Gaiman began breaking as this year’s six-week workshop hurtled into its third week. As we emerge from the workshop…

Week Six in Review

The workshop had a bit of a shake-up this week. Due to the CrowdStrike airline disruptions, our Week Six Instructor, Carmen Maria Machado, was unable…

The 2025 Summer Workshop Instructors & Format

The Clarion West Six-Week workshop will be virtual in 2025, with a new format designed to give students more time to write, additional lecture time…

Week Five in Review

Our Week 5 instructor, Ruoxi Chen, brought her deep knowledge of markets and vast experience as an in-house acquiring editor to the classroom this week….
